mapper.sql: article_id, user_id, views, likes, comments, collects, ctime, mtime
mapper.select: select user_id, count(article_id) as articles, sum(views) as total_views, sum(likes) as total_likes, sum(comments) as total_comments, sum(collects) as total_collects from article_stat where user_id = #{userId};

select t2.article_id as article_id, t2.hot_rank as hot_rank from article t1 join article_stat t2 on t1.id = t2.article_id where t1.category_id = #{categoryId} and t2.hot_rank > 0 order by t2.hot_rank desc, t1.id desc limit 20;
select article_id, hot_rank from article_stat order by hot_rank desc, article_id desc limit 50;
